channel.title: Ruthless-Pkz V2
channel.description:
Hey guys its me again and have just finshed v2 of ruthless-pkz v2 Ive been a bit lazy and busy around the last few weeks But im ready to release it too you!
i am on silab i am called ruthless BTW: I Added summoning (A VERY SPECIAL THANKS TO PINGU of the silab forums) ^_^ ^_^
First off credits: 40 % me 30 % Owner Brian FOR HIS AMAZING SOURCE :lol: 20 % Silab and Mopar Tuts (Mainly silab0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DOWNLOAD LINK: :D
http://uppit.com/v/N5JTQ19C http://uppit.com/v/N5JTQ19C http://uppit.com/v/N5JTQ19C
